def count_special_subarrays(n: int) -> int:
    MOD = 998244354
    if n == 1:
        return 1
    factorials = [1]
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        factorials.append(factorials[-1] * i % MOD)
    arr = [n]
    for i in range(n - 2):
        a = n - i - 1
        arr.append(a * arr[-1] % MOD)
    cumulative_sums = [arr[0]]
    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        cumulative_sums.append((cumulative_sums[-1] + arr[i]) % MOD)
    x = n * factorials[-1] % MOD
    ans = (x - cumulative_sums[-1]) % MOD
    return ans
